author: jeremias
msg: Removed sample servlet as it is now under the main source tree as package org.apache.fop.servlet.

author: jeremias
msg: Added servlet.jar so the servlet compiles.

author: jeremias
msg: Added target for building the servlet.
Default target is now "all" which, besides the jar, also builds the WAR and the PDF transcoder.

author: jeremias
msg: Servlet moved into normal source as package org.apache.fop.servlet.
Refactored FopServlet to use JAXP instead of XSLTInputHandler.
Improved code to serve as educational example.
FopPrintServlet compiles but doesn't work because no AWT renderer is currently available.
FopServlet works fine here but currently only support filenames as input parameters. Should be improved.
